channel.title: Home on Portraits of Resilience
channel.description: Recent content in Home on Portraits of Resilience

item.title: Truly Human with Accenture
item.description: At Accenture’s Truly Human program, in their lovely studio space in the Prudential Center. I gave a talk and several senior executives talked about their own experiences of finding resilience at work.

item.title: NewTV Interview
item.description: With Ellen Meyers, host of Books and Beyond. You can watch it here.

item.title: WGBH TV with Jim Braude
item.description: A wonderful experience being interviewed with Haley and Cat by Jim Braude on WGBH TV’s Greater Boston. Here’s the moment just after Haley called Jim “sir” and he reacted with astonishment.

item.title: Installation for Mental Health Month
item.description: At the Newton Free Library in Newton, MA for the month of May.

item.title: PBS Newshour recording
item.description: An incredibly exciting day: the team from Newshour visited us at MIT. Here is Jeff Brown interviewing Haley, Victor and Emily in an MIT classroom with producer Anne Davenport looking on. Amazingly, Newshour gave us two segments. You can watch them here and here.

item.title: All Things Considered Interview
item.description: At WBUR’s studio with Emily Tang and Victor Morales, and our host Lisa Mullins. Thanks to Lisa and her producer Lynn Jolicoeur for a wonderful interview!

item.title: Talk and Panel at MIT Press Bookstore
item.description: I gave a talk at the MIT Press Bookstore in Cambridge, and was joined in a panel discussion by Cat, Victor and Sally.

item.title: At the bindery
item.description: At WBUR’s studio with Emily Tang and Victor Morales, and our host Lisa Mullins. Thanks to Lisa and her producer Lynn Jolicoeur for a wonderful interview!

item.title: At the bindery
item.description: The book is almost ready! At Acme Bookbinding in Charlestown with Paul Parisi, president of Acme, and Janet Rossi, production manager of MIT Press.

item.title: On press!
item.description: On press at Studley in Dalton, MA, with owner and CEO Suzanne Salinetti, master printers Jay and Scott, design manager Yasuyo Iguchi, and production manager Janet Rossi.
